title: Son of a Boy Dad: Ep. 66 - Get Yo Balls Right
description:
Son of a Boy Dad: Ep. 66 - Get Yo Balls Right -- Sas & Rone discuss many, many things -- Full episodes also available on YOUTUBE -- Allbirds: Lace up the Tree Flyer and get running today at https://barstool.link/AllbirdsBSS -- Gametime: Download the Gametime app at https://barstool.link/GametimeApp and redeem code BOYDAD for $20 off your first purchase (terms apply). -- Manscaped: Get 20% Off and Free Shipping with the code SON at https://barstool.link/ManscapedSOBD


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/sonofaboydad
